title: Jai Hindley: ‘The Level Is Getting Higher, Guys Are Having to Be More Extreme with Their Training’
content:
The Australian says he was 'in pieces' in the final week of the Tour de France after injuring his back in a major crash on stage 14.

Read the full article at Jai Hindley: ‘The Level Is Getting Higher, Guys Are Having to Be More Extreme with Their Training’ on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
